database.body:
The first release of the database using the new format.

The release consists of a gzipped JSON file containing:

- the version name (eg. *v0.2.0*)
- a timestamp with the key ``created_at``
- the virus data compatible for import into Virtool v2.0.0+
database.name: v0.2.0

hmm.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles
hmm.name: v0.2.1

hmm.body:
- the first release using TravisCI for building and testing
- merge annotations and profiles into one archive
hmm.name: v0.2.0

software.body:
#### Added
- use validation in subtraction creation API endpoint
- raise specific exception `ClientError` when client files are missing (#393)

#### Fixed
- fix unhideable create user modal (#388)
- fix failing cancellation of waiting jobs (#387)
- fix lagging version displayed in client ui after software update
- fix unhandled `TypeError: 'NoneType' object is not subscriptable` (#382)
- fix unhandled `ValueError: is not valid SemVer string` (#380)
software.name: v2.0.5

software.body:
#### Added
- add dict-like features to `app_settings.Settings` class
- allow configuration and use of a proxy server for outgoing requests
- allow skipping of database checks and settings initialisation
- allow  `paginate()` handler utility function to take `pymongo`-style sort list
- add sample quality chart axis labels
- gracefully show error page when client files missing
- show analysis item placeholder in list in list before analyze request returns
- use `aioinotify ` instead of `inotify` to watch files
- warn user when leaving page while upload in progress

#### Changed
- avoid use of `hasOwnProperty` in `websocket.js`
- clean up `AnalysisDetail` component
- pip upgrade `aiohttp`
- pip upgrade `raven`
- refactor `test_app.py`
- reorganize `organize.py` module

#### Removed
- remove Gitter link from readme

#### Fixed
- ensure that JSON-formatted error responses are returned at all API endpoints
- fix client error when uploading files (#385)
- fix issue when adding isolate in client
- fix floating filter button in pathoscope results
- fix issue with connecting to non-local Mongo host (#373)
- improve rendering of pathoscope coverage charts
- improve sample quality chart print layout
- upgrade distutils `setup.py` and `cx-freeze` to fix build issues
software.name: v2.0.4

software.body:
#### Added
- show progress bar for analysis loading

#### Changed
- performance improvements for web client
- reduction in web client payload size

#### Fixed
- fix ``DocumentToLarge`` exception for large NuVs result sets
software.name: v2.0.3

software.body:
#### Fixed
- prevent unhandled error ``struct.error`` during PathoscopeBowtie
- fixes #314 
- fixes #315
software.name: v2.0.2

software.body:
#### Changed
- prevent creation of samples with no associated files
- block viewing of sample detail when import is not complete
software.name: v2.0.1

software.body:
#### Added
- add ``remove_file`` and ``upload_file`` permission types
- reintroduce and fix sample rights tab in sample detail view

#### Changed
- filter results of sample find API based on requesting users' rights
- make rendering of sample detail views dependent on users' rights to that sample
- rename ``modify_options`` permission to ``modify_settings``

#### Removed
- remove server lifecycle API endpoints

#### Fixed
- completely close file watcher processes on server restart (#306, #183)
- fix brief display of incorrect HMM detail on open
- fix default sample rights settings view
- fix failing error-tracking initialization (Sentry.io)
- fix incorrect numbering in page position indicators
- permission-protect all applicable API endpoints
software.name: v2.0.0

software.body:
#### Added
- implement job pagination and searching (#298)

#### Changed
- server optimizations

#### Fixed
- disable click for in-progress analysis items (#299)
- fix authentication for requests authorized by API keys
- fix recurring ``InvalidStateError`` during a bad ``_to_list`` callback (#170)
software.name: v2.0.0-beta.13

software.body:
#### Changed
- don't autofocus on input field in subtraction creation form

#### Fixed
- fix freeze when reverting virus history then navigating back to _Virus_ tab (#287)

- fix rendering issue in NuVs BLAST result views
- fix subtraction creation pop-up visiblity issues (#294)

software.body:

software.body:
#### Changed
- hide (reserve) read files that are being used in sample creation jobs (resolves #281)
- live refresh sample data as it is updated on the server

software.body:
#### Added
- add ``no_sentry`` command-line argument to disable error reporting
- add report issue button to user context menu
- automatically reload browser after software update
- automatically clean up orphaned subtractions
- update API key and session permissions when user or group data changes

#### Changed
- further improve software release workflow
- hide sample and subtraction creation buttons for non-permitted users
- update some Python dependencies

#### Fixed
- allow removal of subtractions
- fix alignment of HMM page counter
- fix issues with URL being affected by virus creation modal
- fix non-functional sample removal

software.body: Fixes problems caused by enhancements introduced in v1.7.5.
software.name: v1.7.6

software.body:
##### Client
- migrate to EcmaScript6 (#18)
- implement Babel and ESLint in client build process
- switch to Yarn for package management
- introduce read library uploads (#5)
- introduce a new interface for viewing NuVs results

##### Server
- starting building tests using pytest
- restructure dispatcher module to be more testable
- re-implement file watching system to use inotify and function as a Virtool collection

##### Package
- remove 'scripts' directory
software.name: v1.7.5

software.body: Remove the user manual portion of the documentation and move it to [virtool-manual](https://github.com/virtool/virtool-manual).
